hero.title: Welcome to GelBileli
hero.lead1: Math can feel tricky sometimes. You study hard, but later forget some parts. We all do that—it's normal! Those small gaps can trip you up on tests or real problems.
hero.lead2: That's why I made Test Seljerme. It uses simple, friendly tests to find your weak spots fast. Get clear tips on what to practice, save time, and build confidence. Let's fix those gaps together and make math easier.

features.title: Why choose?
features.adaptiveDesc: From basics to advanced, our tests include every main topic and subtopic you'll need for: school, university entrance exams, and more.
features.insightsDesc: See your full score for the topic, plus a simple breakdown of subtopics. It shows what you're great at and what needs fixing, so you know exactly where to study.
features.guidedDesc: Use the results to work only on your weak spots. Then, come back and take the test again to see how much you've improved.

1.title: Take an Initial Test
1.desc: Select your topic and start the time-limited test, which includes a mix of difficulty levels.

2.title: Know Your Mistakes
2.desc: Receive immediate, detailed feedback identifying your exact strengths and weaknesses.

3.title: Learn and Practice
3.desc: Review your results to see your performance. Simple visual progress boxes show your status for each subtopic.

4.title: Re-Test and Progress
4.desc: Take a new test on the same topics/difficulty to track your improvement.

curriculum.title: Our Complete Math Curriculum
curriculum.intro: Explore our topics from elementary foundations through advanced calculus.

algebra1.title: Algebra I (Grades 9–10)
algebra1.subtitle: Essential building blocks of high school algebra.

topics.quadratics: Quadratic Equations: Factoring, Completing the Square, Quadratic Formula

topics.circles: Circles: Arcs, Chords, Central & Inscribed Angles

algebra2.title: Algebra II / Advanced Algebra (Grades 10–11)
algebra2.subtitle: Expanding algebraic concepts for higher math.

topics.sequences: Sequences & Series: Arithmetic, Geometric, Sigma Notation
topics.probability: Probability & Combinatorics: Permutations, Combinations, Binomial Theorem
topics.conics: Conic Sections: Parabolas, Ellipses, Hyperbolas, Circles

precalc.title: Pre-Calculus: Trig & Functions
precalc.subtitle: Foundational topics for advanced math study.

topics.trigFunctions: Trig Functions: sin, cos, tan, csc, sec, cot
topics.polynomial: Polynomial, Rational, Exponential, Logarithmic, Piecewise, Step Functions

topics.integrals: Integrals: Definite & Indefinite, Area Under Curve
topics.data: Data Analysis: Mean, Median, Mode, Standard Deviation

modal.title: Start Your Math Test
modal.intro: Enter your details and select a topic to begin your adaptive assessment.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: Have a question about math tests or need help? We're here—reply within 24 hours!
contact.social: Follow us on [social links, e.g., Twitter or Instagram].

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Test Seljerme, we respect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our math learning platform.
privacy.personalInfo: Personal Info: Name, email, and test responses (from sign-up forms).
privacy.usageData: Usage Data: IP address, browser type, and pages visited (via cookies for better site experience).
privacy.useDesc: We use your data to create personalized tests, track progress, and send helpful updates. We don't sell or share it with third parties except for secure processors (e.g., email services).
privacy.securityDesc: Your data is stored securely. You can access, update, or delete it anytime—email us at [your-email@example.com].
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies for analytics. You can manage them in your browser settings.
privacy.questions: If you have questions, contact us at [your-email@example.com].

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Test Seljerme, you agree to these terms. If you don't, please don't use the site.
terms.servicesDesc: We provide free personalized math tests and learning tools. Content is for educational use only—no warranties on results.
terms.rule2: Don't copy or share our content without permission.
terms.rule3: You must be 13+ to use the site (or have parent consent).
terms.rightsDesc: We own all site content. We're not liable for any issues from using our tools. We can end access anytime for rule breaks.
terms.changesDesc: We may update these terms—check back. Governed by [your country/state] laws.

results.subtitle: Great job completing the assessment! Here's how you did.
